item.title: Mastering Bayes
item.description: The mind of Homo sapiens is an inference machine. The visual inputs of a darkening sky and distant sound of thunder, combined with the the internal state of your brain (memory), leads to the inevitable output of you taking your umbrella with you. However, sometimes our minds lets us down. Objective This blog post considers some common malfunctions in our reasoning by using some toy examples where statistics can help and then moves on to the modern problem of deciding which web page is better at increasing the outcome of interest (e.
